title: Programming Languages
para: I'm proficient in key web languages - HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling me to build web solutions from the ground up.

title: Advanced Frameworks
para: I specialize in advanced frameworks such as React and Angular, which empower me to create interactive web applications.

title: Database Management
para: With expertise in both MySQL and MongoDB, I ensure your data is managed effectively, tailored to your specific needs.

title: Version Control
para: Using Git, I maintain code integrity, making it easier for collaboration and project management.

title: Responsive Design
para: I design websites that adapt seamlessly to various devices, ensuring a consistent user experience.

title: SEO Optimization
para: I implement SEO best practices to boost your website's visibility in search engine results.
